description: Retrieves the complete configuration information for one app monitor.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The app monitor to retrieve information for.

nested_items.name: AppMonitor
nested_items.description: A structure containing all the configuration information for the app monitor.

nested_items.name: AppMonitorConfiguration
nested_items.description: A structure that contains much of the configuration data for the app monitor.

nested_items.name: AllowCookies
nested_items.description: If you set this to true, the RUM web client sets two cookies, a session cookie and a user cookie. The cookies allow the RUM web client to collect data relating to the number of users an application has and the behavior of the application across a sequence of events. Cookies are stored in the top-level domain of the current page.

nested_items.name: EnableXRay
nested_items.description: If you set this to true, RUM enables X-Ray tracing for the user sessions that RUM samples. RUM adds an X-Ray trace header to allowed HTTP requests. It also records an X-Ray segment for allowed HTTP requests. You can see traces and segments from these user sessions in the X-Ray console and the CloudWatch ServiceLens console. For more information, see What is X-Ray?

nested_items.name: ExcludedPages
nested_items.description: A list of URLs in your website or application to exclude from RUM data collection.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FavoritePages
nested_items.description: A list of pages in your application that are to be displayed with a 'favorite' icon in the CloudWatch RUM console.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: GuestRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the guest IAM role that is attached to the Amazon Cognito identity pool that is used to authorize the sending of data to RUM.

nested_items.name: IdentityPoolId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Cognito identity pool that is used to authorize the sending of data to RUM.

nested_items.name: IncludedPages
nested_items.description: If this app monitor is to collect data from only certain pages in your application, this structure lists those pages.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SessionSampleRate
nested_items.description: Specifies the portion of user sessions to use for RUM data collection. Choosing a higher portion gives you more data but also incurs more costs.

nested_items.name: Telemetries
nested_items.description: An array that lists the types of telemetry data that this app monitor is to collect.
errors indicates that RUM collects data about unhandled JavaScript errors raised by your application.
performance indicates that RUM collects performance data about how your application and its resources are loaded and rendered. This includes Core Web Vitals.
http indicates that RUM collects data about HTTP errors thrown by your application.

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: The date and time that this app monitor was created.

nested_items.name: CustomEvents
nested_items.description: Specifies whether this app monitor allows the web client to define and send custom events.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Specifies whether this app monitor allows the web client to define and send custom events. The default is for custom events to be DISABLED.

nested_items.name: DataStorage
nested_items.description: A structure that contains information about whether this app monitor stores a copy of the telemetry data that RUM collects using CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: CwLogEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicated whether the app monitor stores copies of the data that RUM collects in CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: CwLogGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the log group where the copies are stored.

nested_items.name: DeobfuscationConfiguration
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the configuration for how an app monitor can deobfuscate stack traces.

nested_items.name: JavaScriptSourceMaps
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the configuration for how an app monitor can unminify JavaScript error stack traces using source maps.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: The S3Uri of the bucket or folder that stores the source map files. It is required if status is ENABLED.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Specifies whether JavaScript error stack traces should be unminified for this app monitor. The default is for JavaScript error stack trace unminification to be DISABLED.

nested_items.name: Domain
nested_items.description: The top-level internet domain name for which your application has administrative authority.

nested_items.name: DomainList
nested_items.description: List the domain names for which your application has administrative authority.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of this app monitor.

nested_items.name: LastModified
nested_items.description: The date and time of the most recent changes to this app monitor's configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the app monitor.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the app monitor.
(string) ---
(string) ---
